CLI¶

Usage¶

emsuite -t <input_file>
emsuite --tuning <input_file>

Arguments¶

-t, --tuning

Run a tuning calculation with the specified input file.

-h, --help

Show help message and exit.

Examples¶

Basic usage:

emsuite -t tuning.in

With full path:

emsuite -t /path/to/my_calculation.in

Show help:

emsuite --help

Exit Codes¶

Code

Meaning

0

Success

1

Input file not found or invalid

2

Calculation error
